name: Marjatta Metsovaara-Nystrom
biography: Marjatta Metsovaara established her own company, Metsovaara Oy (1954-1990), in Finland. She designs and experiments with fabrics out of non-traditional materials; she also produces wall coverings out of wool, metal, linen, and plastic. She exhibited at the Milan Triennale in 1957 and 1960, when she won a gold medal.
